Fullname_jp: デミウルゴス ドレイカーン

transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+10% caster Priority when an ally scores a critical hit (Only once per turn)
Chain Passive Weakness Gauge reduction +1
transcend.4_1_jp:
ATK DEF HP +16%
味方の攻撃で会心が発生時、
自分の行動ゲージ+10%
(1ターンに一度のみ発動)
チェーンパッシブのWGダメージ+1
transcend.4_1_kr:
ATK DEF HP +16%
아군 치명 공격 시 자신 행동 게이지 +10% (1턴에 1회)
체인 패시브의 WG 감소량 +1
transcend.4_1_zh:
ATK DEF HP +16%
友军发动暴击时,自身行动值+10%(1回合1次)
连携被动的WG减少量+1
transcend.5_1:
ATK DEF HP +22%
Burst Level 3 Unlocked
+50 Action Points at battle start
transcend.5_1_jp:
ATK DEF HP +22%
バーストスキル3段階解禁
戦闘開始時、AP+50
transcend.5_1_kr:
ATK DEF HP +22%
버스트 3단계 해금
입장 시 AP +50
transcend.5_1_zh:
ATK DEF HP +22%
解锁3阶爆发
入场时AP+50
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+25% caster Priority when an ally scores a critical hit (Only once per turn)
transcend.6_jp:
ATK DEF HP +30%
味方に会心が発生した場合
自分の行動ゲージ+25%
(1ターンに一度のみ発動)
transcend.6_kr:
ATK DEF HP +30%
아군 치명 공격 시 자신 행동 게이지 +25% (1턴에 1회)
transcend.6_zh:
ATK DEF HP +30%
友军发动暴击时,自身行动值+25%(1回合1次)

SKT_FIRST.name: Conqueror's Fang
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and deals <color=#28d9ed>2%</color> of the target's Max Health as fixed damage.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> instead of Attack.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、対象の最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>2%</color>の固定ダメージを与える。\nこのスキルは攻撃力の代わりに<color=#28d9ed>最大HP</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고, 대상 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>2%</color> 만큼 고정 피해를 입힙니다.\n이 스킬은 공격력 대신 <color=#28d9ed>최대 체력</color>에 비례하여 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh:
攻击敌人,并使其受到相当于目标生命值上限
<color=#28d9ed>2%</color>的固定伤害。
该技能根据<color=#28d9ed>生命值上限</color>而非攻击力等比提升
伤害。

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Damage dealt increases proportional to missing Health
SKT_BURST_2.effect_jp: 残りHPが低いほど\nダメージUP
SKT_BURST_2.effect_zh: 伤害随损失生命值提升

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changed to Enhanced Skill\nResets cooldown of Dragon Ruler's Breath
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 強化スキルに変更\n【竜王の息吹】スキルターン初期化
SKT_BURST_3.effect_kr: 강화 스킬로 교체\n용왕의 숨결 쿨타임 초기화
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh: 转化为强化技能\n重置龙王吐息冷却时间

SKT_SECOND.name: Doom Heralding Cry
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Grants <color=#28d9ed>Show Your Loyalty!</color> and a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color> to all allies except for the caster for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Max Health.\nIncreases <color=#28d9ed>Penetration</color> of all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 自分を除く味方全体に<color=#28d9ed>【忠義をみせろ】</color>と<color=#28d9ed>シールド</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。自分の最大HPが高いほどシールド量がUPする。\n味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>貫通力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPさせる。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 자신을 제외한 아군 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>충의를 보여라</color> 및 <color=#28d9ed>실드</color>를 부여합니다. 실드량은 자신의 최대 체력에 비례하여 증가합니다.\n<color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>관통력</color>을 증가시킵니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: 使除自身外全体友军获得<color=#28d9ed>表明你的忠心吧</color>和<color=#28d9ed>护盾</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。护盾量根据自身生命值上限等比提升。\n使全体友军的<color=#28d9ed>穿透力</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Dragon Ruler's Breath
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks an enemy.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> instead of Attack.\nEnemies killed by this skill cannot be Resurrected or Revived.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与える。\nこのスキルは攻撃力の代わりに<color=#28d9ed>最大HP</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。\nこのスキルで倒れた敵は復活と蘇生ができなくなる。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격합니다.\n이 스킬은 공격력 대신 <color=#28d9ed>최대 체력</color>에 비례하여 피해가 증가합니다.\n이 스킬로 사망한 적은 부활 및 소생이 불가능합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人。\n该技能根据<color=#28d9ed>生命值上限</color>而非攻击力等比提升伤害。\n因该技能死亡的敌人无法触发复活与苏醒效果。

5: Damage dealt increases proportional to missing Health
5_jp: 残りHPが低いほど\nダメージUP
5_zh: 伤害随损失生命值提升

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: Damage dealt by Skill Chain attacks of the caster increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> instead of Attack and always has elemental advantage.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> instead of Attack.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:このスキルは攻撃力の代わりに<color=#28d9ed>最大HP</color>が高いほどダメージがUPし、有利属性の攻撃判定でダメージを与える。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:このスキルは攻撃力の代わりに<color=#28d9ed>最大HP</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 자신의 스킬 체인 공격이 공격력 대신 <color=#28d9ed>최대 체력</color>에 비례하여 피해가 증가하며, 항상 유리한 상성으로 적용됩니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격력 대신 <color=#28d9ed>최대 체력</color>에 비례하여 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携技能自由顺序效果</color>:自身的连携攻击根据<color=#28d9ed>生命值上限</color>而非攻击力等比提升伤害,且总是以优势属性施展。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:根据<color=#28d9ed>生命值上限</color>而非攻击力等比提升伤害。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
